alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:11PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LIMESTONE... SOUTHWESTERN MORGAN AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CST... At 910 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Brushy Lake, or 10 miles southeast of Moulton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40-50 mph and pea-dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Priceville, Falkville, Somerville, Mooresville, Speake, Neel, Massey, and Basham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central Alabama.
